snippet.title: Happy New Year from the Installation 01 Team!
snippet.description:
Soon™

Installation 01 is a free, fan-made Halo game and artistic tribute to the series by passionate fans from around the globe. Our goal is to bring a unique classic Halo multiplayer experience to Windows, macOS, and Linux. We hope to combine to best elements from each Halo game into something new. 

Visit the Installation 01 website for weekly updates! We've been doing them for over a year! https://installation01.org

Twitter: https://twitter.com/Installation01
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/installation_01/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Installation01

Soon Studios branding © 2552 Soon Studios. All rights reserved.

Website: https://soonstudios.net
Twitter: https://twitter.com/Soon_Studios
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/SoonStudios

Halo © Microsoft Corporation. Installation 01 is created under Microsoft's Game Content Usage Rules using assets based on the Halo universe and is not endorsed by or affiliated with Microsoft. 
https://www.xbox.com/en-us/developers...

The Installation 01 Team ("i01 Team") is a non-commercial subsidiary of Soon Studios. The i01 Team is currently in contact with representatives of 343 Industries and Microsoft. More information about our legal standing can be found at https://i01.co/updates/343-industries.
